INIT.init: to getAvailable [ ] [ make :game_available [ ] for [ :i 0 3 ] [ for [ :j 0 3 ] [ make :x fromgame + + :i ", :j if [ == 0 len dzitems :x ] [ additem :x :game_available ] ] ] ] getAvailable

MOVE.setValue: ifelse [ == :game_turn 0 ] [ putdzitem "obj "X fromgame :game_state_input  ] [ putdzitem "obj "O fromgame :game_state_input ] getAvailable

goals: make :game_log [ ] to check [ :name0 :name1 :name2 ] [        make :z1 dzitem "obj fromgame :name0    make :z2 dzitem "obj fromgame :name1    make :z3 dzitem "obj fromgame :name2        make :total ( + :z1 :z2 :z3 )        additem :total :game_log         if [ or == :total "XXX == :total "OOO ] [          make :game_state_output :z1       ] ]    for [ :i 0 3 ] [     make :name0 + + :i ", 0    make :name1 + + :i ", 1    make :name2 + + :i ", 2        check :name0 :name1 :name2             make :name0 + + 0 ", :i     make :name1 + + 1 ", :i    make :name2 + + 2 ", :i        check :name0 :name1 :name2 ] check "0,0 "1,1 "2,2 check "0,2 "1,1 "2,0
